attributes.comment:
Dear Elected Officials -

Increasing the costs of international adoption will have one result, fewer adoptions by middle and
lower income families. The rich will continue to adopt while lower income families looe the ability
to adopt internationally. Further, international adoption is a positive action that demonstrates the
charity and character of the american people at a time when we could use the positive press.
Please vote against the increases. Please help make international adoption available to the people
of this great country who want to raise adopted children, regardless of the parents income level.

Sincerely,
Chris Braun
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Christopher Braun
